name: Under Sea-rch
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021: Under sea-rch is a game about searching... Under water!!

Your task is to find poseidon's trident

He offers you 50.000 bucks if you find

Go in this under water adventure to get that money!!

Controls:

Keyboard arrows: move

Space Bar: fixate your cable (this allows you to make turns)

This was my first ever game jam game, so any suggestion is welcome!
